name: HiveCorp - Demo
description:
Counterspell Studios is a small two-man indie studio based in Stockholm, Sweden. We love playing games as much as we love making them. 

We're now on a mission to build up our own indie studio and figured that the best way in doing so, is from the ground up. That's how we got started on making our very first game HiveCorp!

HiveCorp has been developed on our spare time during 2022-2023. We hope you will love it as much as we loved making it!

If you do like it, you can wishlist it on Steam or send us a donation here on itch. We need every bit of help we can get to reach out and continue making games! And hopefully one day in the future do this full-time.
